mapper.select: SELECT g.*, s.name AS stadiumName FROM games g LEFT JOIN stadiums s ON g.stadium_id = s.stadium_id -- 구장 테이블 조인 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY g.game_date ASC, g.game_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games (game_date, game_time, home_team_code, away_team_code, stadium_id, score_home, score_away, status, etc_info, home_starter, away_starter, cancel_reason, created_at) VALUES (#{gameDate}, #{gameTime}, #{homeTeamCode}, #{awayTeamCode}, #{stadiumId}, IFNULL(#{scoreHome}, 0), IFNULL(#{scoreAway}, 0), #{status}, #{etcInfo}, #{homeStarter}, #{awayStarter}, #{cancelReason}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET game_date = #{gameDate}, game_time = #{gameTime}, home_team_code = #{homeTeamCode}, away_team_code = #{awayTeamCode}, stadium_id = #{stadiumId}, score_home = #{scoreHome}, score_away = #{scoreAway}, status = #{status}, etc_info = #{etcInfo}, home_starter = #{homeStarter}, away_starter = #{awayStarter}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE game_id = #{gameId}
